name: @kennyfrc/streamline-cli
description: CLI tool for Streamline Icons API

scripts.test:interface1: export STREAMLINE_API_KEY=JbrohwGRskTbdyKy.fff72ef622bbadf50ae74c976feec8e8 && npm run link && streamline search global home --limit 2
scripts.test:interface2: export STREAMLINE_API_KEY=JbrohwGRskTbdyKy.fff72ef622bbadf50ae74c976feec8e8 && npm run link && streamline search family material-pro-sharp-line user --limit 1
scripts.test:interface3: export STREAMLINE_API_KEY=JbrohwGRskTbdyKy.fff72ef622bbadf50ae74c976feec8e8 && npm run link && streamline download svg ico_CVtS8rNWud0BTWe2 --output ./test-downloads
scripts.test:interface4: export STREAMLINE_API_KEY=JbrohwGRskTbdyKy.fff72ef622bbadf50ae74c976feec8e8 && npm run link && streamline download png ico_tUHFQeoINKLdP6CV --size 128 --output ./test-downloads
scripts.test:interface5: export STREAMLINE_API_KEY=JbrohwGRskTbdyKy.fff72ef622bbadf50ae74c976feec8e8 && npm run link && streamline get icon ico_tUHFQeoINKLdP6CV
scripts.test:all: npm run test:interface1 && npm run test:interface2 && npm run test:interface3 && npm run test:interface4 && npm run test:interface5
